featured.text: As early as 1000 BC, Egyptian children played with hoop toys of dried grapevine.

definition.zh_def: 葡萄藤；傳聞或小道消息
definition.en_def: A climbing plant that produces grapes; also refers to an informal means of spreading information or rumors.
definition.example: I heard it through the grapevine that they are planning a surprise party.
